meanings.definition: counterculturists (noun): individuals who reject or oppose the dominant culture
meanings.sent1: The counterculturists gathered to protest against mainstream beliefs.
meanings.sent2: Many counterculturists in the 1960s challenged societal norms.
meanings.sent3: The counterculturists decided to have a peaceful demonstration in the park.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of conformity, counterculturists are like colorful fish swimming against the current.
meanings.sent5: The counterculturists' message of freedom resonated with the younger generation.

meanings.definition: counterculturists (adjective): relating to or characteristic of counterculture movements
meanings.sent1: The counterculturists music festival was a celebration of nonconformity.
meanings.sent2: Her counterculturists fashion sense stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The counterculturists art exhibit was both thought-provoking and unconventional.
meanings.sent4: The counterculturists movement of the 1960s left a lasting impact on society.
meanings.sent5: The counterculturists lifestyle embraced individuality and creativity.
